system.availability: Allows the recharging of various devices, requires one minute. Difficulty varies: +10, Power Cell, Illuminator. +0: Weapon Charge Pack, Data-Slate, Bridge Terminal. -10: Shuttle Electronics, Servo-Skull. -20: Lascannon Charge Pack, Bridge Hololith. -30: Cogitator Core, Reactor Machine Spirit, Xenos Technology.
system.cost: Requires Mechanicus Implants to use. Poor gives -10 to all Toughness Tests made to use this, Best give +10.
